body: AAPL Ending Diagonal To Complete Simple Zigzag $AAPL https://talkmarkets.com/content/stocks--equities/aapl-ending-diagonal-to-complete-simple-zigzag?post=351889

links.title: AAPL Ending Diagonal To Complete Simple Zigzag
links.description: The internal AAPL structure suggests the development of the primary fifth wave. This takes the form of an ending diagonal (1)-(2)-(3)-(4)-(5) of the intermediate degree. At the level of 150.33, an intermediate correction (4) in the form of a minor triple zigzag W-X-Y-X-Z ended.

MetaMask Warns Apple Users of iCloud Phishing Attacks https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/metamask-warns-apple-users-of-icloud-phishing-attacks/ $AAPL $BTC.X $ETH.X $DOGE.X $SHIB.X

links.title: MetaMask Warns Apple Users of iCloud Phishing Attacks
links.description: The Ethereum non-custodial wallet - MetaMask - warned Apple users to beware of iCloud phishing attacks as consumers risk losing their funds if their password "isn't strong enough." Several weeks ago, MetaMask expanded into the Apple ecosystem by enabling users to buy digital assets with Apple Pay.
